name: For The Eyes Of The Watchers
name_original: For The Eyes Of The Watchers
description:
Game Controls

WASD = Movement
Left Mouse Button = Attack
Right Mouse Button = Shop Interaction
Shift / Spacebar = Dash

How to play

Your main objective in this game is to kill all the waves, you can spawn new waves by hitting "The Eye", repeat that until all the waves has been defeated.
After defeating the waves, you will fight against the big boss, kill the monsters he spawn and escape from the roots.
You can purchase new weapons (and maybe stats upgrade in the future) on the shop, be sure to open all the chests to get the most coins as possible, and try out the weapons.

Side Notes

This game was made by only 2 people for fun, we didn't made any money on the development process, if you like the game and wan't to help us, feel free to donate, you will be contributing to the Indie Game community, and you will be helping us to develop new games and update the existent ones.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is just a demo from a still-in-development project, after playing it be sure to leave a comment about your gameplay, if it was good or bad, how do you like the game, suggestions and anything you want.
